changelog.md.Ajout pour certain \"repo\" de la possib: Addition for certain "repo" of the possibility of recovering the core of jeedom
changelog.md.Possibilité d'afficher\/masquer les pane: Possibility to show / hide plugin panels on mobile and or desktop (be careful now by default the panels are hidden)
changelog.md.Possibilité de désactiver les mises à jo: Ability to disable plugin updates (as well as verification)
changelog.md.Possibilité de forcé la versification de: Ability to force versification of plugin updates
changelog.md.Légère refonte du centre de mise à jour: Slight redesign of the update center
changelog.md.Possibilité de désactiver la vérificatio: Ability to disable automatic check for updates
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug qui remettait toute: Fixed a bug that reset all data to 0 after a reboot
changelog.md.Possibilité de configurer le niveau de l: Ability to configure the log level of a plugin directly on the configuration page of the plugin

changelog.md.Possibilité d'autoriser un utilisateur à: Ability to authorize a user to connect only from a computer on the local network

changelog.md.Renforcement de la gestion des erreurs s: Reinforcement of error handling on widgets
changelog.md.Refonte du système de cache de Jeedom (u: Jeedom cache system redesign (use of doctrine cache)
changelog.md.Cela permet par exemple de connecter Jee: This allows for example to connect Jeedom to a redis or memcached server

changelog.md.Attention lors du redémarrage de Jeedom: Be careful when restarting Jeedom the cache is emptied so you have to wait for all the information to come back up

changelog.md.wifi, ip fixe… (reviendra sûrement sous: wifi, fixed ip… (will surely come back as a plugin)

changelog.md.ajout d'un système d'analyse syntaxique: addition of a parsing system (eliminates interactions with large syntax errors such as "the room")
changelog.md.Suppression de la mise à jour de l'inter: Suppression of the interface update by nodejs (switch to pulling every second on the list of events)
changelog.md.Possibilité pour les applications tierce: Possibility for third-party applications to request events via the API
changelog.md.Refonte du système \" d'action sur valeu: Redesign of the "action on value" system with the possibility of carrying out several actions and also the addition of all the possible actions in the scenarios (be careful it may be necessary to reconfigure all of them following the update)
changelog.md.Possibilité de désactiver un bloc dans u: Ability to deactivate a block in a scenario

changelog.md.Refonte de la page de gestion des plugin: Redesign of the plugins management page
changelog.md.Ajout des adresses mac des différentes i: Adding mac addresses of the different interfaces

changelog.md.Ajout sur la page des scénarios d'un tes: Addition to the scenarios page of an expression tester
